attributes.action: Scrap any MP bonus/payments paid when standing down from their constituancy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It was reported earlier today that MP's can get up to £60,000 when they leave their seat.
This in my eyes is no different than the Bankers bonuses paid even after poor performance.
They should be made to go immediatly without payment as they are only staying to receive the payment and not to serve the public that they are supposed to represent.
